items.sentence: I should\'ve known something was wrong when Tom wasn\'t here by 2:30.
Tom isn\'t the only one here who thinks it\'s a good idea to do that.
Health isn\'t everything, but without it, everything else is nothing.
When did you find out that Tom was the one who broke into your house?
The sheriff said the victim was carjacked at gunpoint on Park Street.
Tom\'s teacher asked him to read the poem he\'d written to the class.
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to admit that he\'d made a mistake.
Tom needed to be punished for doing that, so his father punished him.
Tom wanted to hire us both, but he said he could only hire one of us.
I looked out the window and didn\'t see anything out of the ordinary.
